name: Isiline
goal: Isiline is a local Internet Service Provider in Piemonte since 1995. We provide Internet to people. Isiline operates on its own infrastructure. Isiline is leader and first mover in FTTH network deployment.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: competition and regulation in Internet development and TLC market, European Commission on Smart EU Funding for Gigabit Society
